description: Play is powerful in learning.  It is engaging, energizing, and enlightening.  This intermediate
level movement technique class explores a range of physical activities designed to develop physical
skill, confidence, and intelligence--all in the spirit of play.  It incorporates activities for
developing body organization and alignment while challenging student's imagination and creative
sensibilities.  Tumbling, terraining, contact improvisation, and Capoeira represent a few of the
included activities.  Prerequisites: Dance 105, 110, or 111.  Offered annually in the Fall Semester.
